org.gvsig.raster.cache.buffer

Interface BufferParam


  • public interface BufferParam
    Buffer parameters. This class contains generic parameters. Basic information to fill: x, y, w, h, datatype and bandcount. If the buffer is RasterReadOnlyBuffer is necessary a IBufferDataSource too. 02/11/2008

    • Method Summary
